42773.summary: Some customers in the Silver Heights area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42773.title: Oct 8 – Winnipeg (Silver Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
